sentences.english: The drillmaster is drilling privates how to use bayonet.
sentences.chinese: 教官正在教士兵们使用刺刀。

sentences.english: Some instructors could be seen discreetly cleaning their hands with antiseptic wipes.
sentences.chinese: 礼毕，一些教官为了安全起见用杀菌水洗手。

sentences.english: The new drillmaster has gained the soldier's respect quickly.
sentences.chinese: 新来的教官很快赢得了士兵的尊敬。

sentences.english: Ginger sinus instructors to turn a blind eye to my temper attitude.
sentences.chinese: 姜窦对教官们对本人的视而不见态度大为光火。

sentences.english: She found an instructor and started taking lessons.
sentences.chinese: 她找到一位教官，开始上课。

sentences.english: When the military would be over in the morning, the drillmaster asked my son what his name was.
sentences.chinese: 上午军训课快要结束的时候，教官问儿子叫什么名字。

sentences.english: But, the military when in military training to our demands are high.
sentences.chinese: 但是，教官在军训的时候对我们的要求还是很高的。

sentences.english: Afternoon, our instructors at the leadership, to play paintball.
sentences.chinese: 下午，我们在教官的带领下，去打彩弹。

sentences.english: He was promoted to the rank of captain and became lead instructor of the Tipoca City training facility.
sentences.chinese: 他被晋升为上尉，成为蒂波卡城训练基地的首席教官。

sentences.english: During the training period, I had experienced a great hardship due to the hot weather and severe trainers.
sentences.chinese: 在军训期间，我必须面对炎热的天气和严厉的教官。

sentences.english: Who was talking with our drillmaster?
sentences.chinese: 谁正在和我们的教官说话？

sentences.english: I was attached to the naval college as a special instructor for six months.
sentences.chinese: 我以六个月的专职教官身份加入了海军学校。
与教官对练刺的精确度。

sentences.english: In here, I need to thank the drillmaster and the teacher , have let me learn firm.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我要感谢教官和老师，让我学会了坚强。

sentences.english: The daily military training of some funny things occur, instructors are too cute.
sentences.chinese: 每天的军训都会发生一些搞笑的事，教官太可爱了。

sentences.english: In 1985, a group of inmates planned the murder of a San Quentin correctional officer.
sentences.chinese: 1985年，一群犯人策划谋杀了监狱惩教官。

definition: junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
middle ranking officer in Chinese army/lieutenant colonel/commander
warrant officer/petty officer/noncommissioned officer (NCO)/Japanese military officer
